title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Enhancing Oral Presentation and Visual Communication Skills in English

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and possession of specialized mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can implement a natural speaking pace (3–4 words per second) and appropriate vocal modulation (intonation/stress) in 3-minute English oral presentations on math topics.

Learners apply information design principles (visual hierarchy, color contrast, bullet-point usage) when creating slides and produce visual materials that achieve over 80% success rate in a user test (10 participants) evaluating core content recognition within 5 seconds for three slide samples.
Learners can communicate while maintaining a 7:3 balance between verbal elements (content delivery) and nonverbal elements (eye contact, gestures, slide utilization) during presentations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
